subject: Hello,
body:
Hello,
I represent a high net-worth investor who is willing to finance your area of experience with assured financial backup as a direct investment loan.Further discussions will be compulsory when you show interest.my email id 
marksmith514@aol.com
Best Regards
Mark Smith

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Mark Smith,

Thank you for reaching out and considering me for this opportunity. It's great to hear that your investor is interested in my area of expertise. Could you please provide more details about the investment? What kind of projects are they interested in? And what would be the expected role on my part?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Maurice
